SELECT TRUNC(ord.ord_date) ord_date, COUNT(*) count, SUM(total_amount) total_amount FROM orders ord WHERE ord.ord_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY TRUNC(ord.ord_date) ORDER BY TRUNC(ord.ord_date)

SELECT mc.m_ctgr_num, m_ctgr_name, count(sc.s_ctgr_num) as sales FROM order_details od INNER JOIN orders ord ON ord.ord_num = od.ord_num INNER JOIN prod_details pd ON pd.pd_num = od.pd_num INNER JOIN prods p ON p.p_num = pd.p_num INNER JOIN sub_ctgr sc ON sc.s_ctgr_num = p.s_ctgr_num INNER JOIN main_ctgr mc ON mc.m_ctgr_num = sc.m_ctgr_num WHERE ord_status = 0 OR ord_status = 1 GROUP BY m_ctgr_name, mc.m_ctgr_num ORDER BY m_ctgr_num

SELECT mc.m_ctgr_num, m_ctgr_name, count(sc.s_ctgr_num) as sales FROM order_details od INNER JOIN orders ord ON ord.ord_num = od.ord_num INNER JOIN prod_details pd ON pd.pd_num = od.pd_num INNER JOIN prods p ON p.p_num = pd.p_num INNER JOIN sub_ctgr sc ON sc.s_ctgr_num = p.s_ctgr_num INNER JOIN main_ctgr mc ON mc.m_ctgr_num = sc.m_ctgr_num WHERE to_char(ord_date,'yyyy-mm') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm') GROUP BY m_ctgr_name, mc.m_ctgr_num ORDER BY m_ctgr_num
